title: What's new on The Zone?
text:
Friday, September 25, 2015 12:30 PM EDT 
What's new on The Zone? Football galore, great action photos, tribute to a coach Browse for Republican American Reprints As the great weather continues and the high school sports schedule rolls along unabated, The Zone is everywhere providing coverage of the action. So, what's new today on The Zone? 1. A detailed look at the Great Valley Rivalry, in football, between Ansonia and Derby; 2. A tribute to a veteran field hockey coach who has a new post; 3. Sensational photos from the week's action; 4. A Friday football primer to get you ready for the weekend's games. And tonight, Live Updates from all of the big football showdowns. More Stories About: The Zone
